heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly sunny east; mostly cloudy west. Chance of a flurry in New York.

heading: Tuesday Night
text: Snow showers north and mountains. Partly cloudy southern valleys.

heading: Wednesday
text: Any morning snow showers north ending. Partly sunny south.

heading: Thursday
text: Brief showers north, then clearing to mostly sunny.
temperature: Upper teens to mid 20s north to south
